name: Crushing Shock
description: Focus all the elemental energies with your staff and blast an enemy for 696 Flame Damage, 696 Frost Damage, and 696 Shock Damage.  Enemies hit while casting are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.
effectLines: Interrupts spells, putting the caster Off Balance. Reduces cost as ability ranks up.
coefDescription: Focus all the elemental energies with your staff and blast an enemy for $1 Flame Damage, $2 Frost Damage, and $3 Shock Damage.  Enemies hit while casting are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for 3 seconds.
rawDescription:
Focus all the elemental energies with your staff and blast an enemy for <<1>>, <<2>>, and <<3>>.

Enemies hit while casting are interrupted, set Off Balance, and stunned for <<4>>.
